title: v1.6.3 Background Cache Fix
details:
The background.js hash-based deduplication was causing bugs #1, #2, #6.

FIX: computeStateHash() now includes saveId in hash calculation. The _clearCacheForEmptyStorage() helper always clears cache when tabs array is empty, regardless of hash comparison.

KEY INSIGHT: Hash comparison should NEVER prevent cache updates for empty state. Different saveId = different write = must be acknowledged.
